src: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.
mt: Siete ensayos evaluaban fármacos readaptados ya aprobados para el paludismo, incluidos cuatro estudios sobre hidroxicloroquina o fosfato de cloroquina.
pert_mt: Siete ensayos evaluaban fármacos readaptados ya aprobados para el paludismo, incluidos cuatro estudios sobre hidroxicloroquina, fosfato de cloroquina y otros antipalúdicos.
bt: Seven trials evaluated re-adapted and approved drugs for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine, chlorophyll phosphate and other anti-malarial drugs.
questions_bt: How many trials evaluated re-adapted and approved drugs for malaria?
What drugs were studied in four of the trials?
What disease were the drugs being evaluated for?
answers_bt: hydroxychloroquine, chlorophyll phosphate and other anti-malarial drugs
contrastive_questions: Were seven trials evaluated for re-adapted and approved drugs for malaria?
Were hydroxychloroquine and chlorophyll phosphate among the drugs studied in four of the trials?

src: Finally, early detection of a confirmed COVID-19 case has exemplified the rapid implementation of this enhanced surveillance in the national network.
mt: Finalmente, la detección temprana de un caso confirmado de COVID-19 ha demostrado la rápida implementación de esta vigilancia mejorada en la red nacional.
pert_mt: Finalmente, la detección temprana de un caso confirmado de COVID-19 ha demostrado la rápida implementación y eficacia de esta vigilancia mejorada en la red nacional.

src: Since we are fitting an SIR-epidemic model in the ABC routine, we anticipate that our results will be robust against weekly case data containing relatively small counts.
mt: Dado que estamos adaptando un modelo epidemiológico SIR en la rutina del cálculo bayesiano aproximado, prevemos que nuestros resultados serán sólidos en comparación con los datos de casos semanales que contienen conteos relativamente pequeños.
pert_mt: Dado que estamos adaptando un modelo epidemiológico SIR en la rutina del cálculo bayesiano aproximado, prevemos que nuestros resultados serán sólidos en comparación con los datos reales de casos semanales que contienen conteos relativamente pequeños.
bt: Since we are adapting an epidemiological SIR model to the routine of the approximate Bayesian calculation, we anticipate that our results will be solid compared to the actual data of weekly cases containing relatively small counts.
questions_bt: What model are they adapting?
What calculation method are they using?
What type of data are they comparing their results to?
contrastive_questions: Are they using the SIR model for their adaptation?
Are they using approximate Bayesian calculation?
Are they comparing their results to weekly cases?

src: The RCGP RSC practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of a LRTI.
mt: Los consultorios del RSC del RCGP que participan en la vigilancia virológica anual de la influenza han comenzado a tomar muestras en pacientes con síntomas de IVRI.
pert_mt: Los consultorios del RSC del RCGP que participan en la vigilancia virológica anual de la influenza han comenzado a tomar muestras en pacientes con síntomas de IVRI y otras enfermedades respiratorias.
bt: RCGP RSC offices involved in the annual virological surveillance of influenza have begun taking samples from patients with symptoms of IVRI and other respiratory diseases.
questions_bt: Which organizations are involved in the annual virological surveillance of influenza?
What diseases, besides IVRI, are the respiratory diseases referred to?
What have the RCGP RSC offices begun doing?
What are the initials of the organizations conducting the surveillance?
answers_src: Sampling from patients showing symptoms of a LRTI
answers_bt: Taking samples from patients with symptoms of IVRI and other respiratory diseases
contrastive_questions: Are the RCGP and RSC involved in the annual virological surveillance of influenza?
Are IVRI and other respiratory diseases mentioned as separate entities?
Are the RCGP RSC offices collecting samples from patients exhibiting symptoms of IVRI and other respiratory illnesses?
Does the answer list both RCGP and RSC as the initials of the organizations conducting the surveillance?

src: Most novel drug candidates (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in Phase II-III clinical trials.
mt: La mayoría de los fármacos nuevos de interés médico (NCE) fallan durante el desarrollo del fármaco, ya sea porque tienen una toxicidad inaceptable o simplemente porque no son eficaces para tratar la enfermedad objetivo, como se muestra en los ensayos clínicos en fase II y III.
pert_mt: La mayoría de los fármacos nuevos de interés médico (NCE) fallan durante el desarrollo del fármaco, ya sea porque tienen una toxicidad inaceptable o simplemente porque no son eficaces para tratar la enfermedad objetivo y causan efectos secundarios, como se muestra en los ensayos clínicos en fase II y III.
bt: Most new medicines of medical interest (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have an unacceptable toxicity or simply because they are not effective in treating the target disease and cause side effects, as shown in the Phase II and III clinical trials.
questions_bt: What happens to most new medicines of medical interest during drug development?
Why do some new medicines fail during drug development?
What types of clinical trials are mentioned?
What are NCEs short for?
answers_src: because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease
answers_bt: because they have an unacceptable toxicity or simply because they are not effective in treating the target disease and cause side effects
contrastive_questions: Most new medicines of medical interest fail during drug development?
Some new medicines fail during drug development because they have an unacceptable toxicity?
Some new medicines fail during drug development because they are not effective in treating the target disease and cause side effects?
Are Phase II and III clinical trials mentioned?
Are NCEs short for New Chemical Entities?

src: At the same time and separately, the RCGP RSC’s surveillance has been extended to monitor the temporal and geographical distribution of COVID-19 infection in the community as well as assess the effectiveness of the containment strategy.
mt: Al mismo tiempo y por separado, se ha ampliado la vigilancia del RSC del RCGP para controlar la distribución temporal y geográfica de la infección COVID-19 en la comunidad, así como para evaluar la eficacia de la estrategia de contención.
pert_mt: Al mismo tiempo y por separado, se ha ampliado la vigilancia del RSC del RCGP para controlar la distribución temporal y geográfica de la infección COVID-19 en la comunidad, así como para evaluar la eficacia de la estrategia de contención y mitigación.
bt: At the same time and separately, the RCGP RSC has expanded its surveillance to monitor the temporal and geographic distribution of COVID-19 infection in the community, as well as to evaluate the effectiveness of the containment and mitigation strategy.
questions_bt: What has expanded its surveillance?
What does the surveillance monitor?
What strategy's effectiveness is being evaluated?
answers_src: the temporal and geographical distribution of COVID-19 infection in the community
answers_bt: the temporal and geographic distribution of COVID-19 infection in the community
contrastive_questions: Has the RCGP RSC expanded its surveillance?
Does the surveillance monitor the temporal distribution of COVID-19 infection in the community?
Is containment and mitigation the strategy being evaluated?

src: Connecting in an affected area may lead to entry restrictions later on, and if you've been in an affected area recently some countries won't even let you change planes.
mt: Una conexión en un área afectada podría derivar en restricciones de ingreso posteriores y, si ha estado en un área afectada en forma reciente, algunos países ni siquiera le permitirán cambiar de avión.
pert_mt: Una conexión en un área afectada podría derivar en restricciones de ingreso posteriores y, si ha estado en un área afectada en forma reciente, algunos países ni siquiera le permitirán cambiar de avión y tendrás que hacer cuarentena obligatoria.
bt: A connection to an affected area could lead to subsequent entry restrictions and, if you have been to an affected area recently, some countries will not even allow you to change planes and will have to make mandatory quarantine.
questions_bt: What could lead to subsequent entry restrictions?
What might happen if you have been to an affected area recently?
Which actions will some countries not allow due to recent travel to an affected area?
answers_bt: A connection to an affected area
Some countries will not even allow you to change planes and will have to make mandatory quarantine
contrastive_questions: Is a connection to an affected area a factor that could lead to subsequent entry restrictions?
Some countries will not allow changing planes from an affected area and require mandatory quarantine?
Will some countries allow changing planes after traveling to an affected area?

src: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful Phase III trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.
mt: En un análisis del 2016 sobre 106 fármacos de interés médico evaluados en ensayos clínicos, el gasto de capital total para un fabricante cuyo fármaco se aprobó en ensayos en fase III exitosos fue de $2600 millones (con el valor del dólar en el 2013), un monto que aumenta a una tasa anual del 8,5 %.
pert_mt: En un análisis del 2016 sobre 106 fármacos de interés médico evaluados en ensayos clínicos, el gasto de capital total para un fabricante cuyo fármaco se aprobó en ensayos en fase III exitosos y se convirtió en un éxito comercial fue de $2600 millones (con el valor del dólar en el 2013), un monto que aumenta a una tasa anual del 8,5 %.
bt: In a 2016 analysis of 106 medicines of medical interest evaluated in clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer whose drug was approved in successful phase III trials and became a commercial success was $2.6 billion (in the dollar value in 2013), an amount that increases at an annual rate of 8.5 percent.
questions_bt: What was the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer whose drug was approved in successful phase III trials and became a commercial success?
What was the dollar value in 2013 of the total capital expenditure?
What is the annual rate of increase for the total capital expenditure?
How many medicines were analyzed in the 2016 analysis?
contrastive_questions: Was the total capital expenditure $2.6 billion?
Did the manufacturer's drug succeed in phase III trials?
Did the manufacturer's drug become a commercial success?
Was the dollar value of the total capital expenditure in 2013 $2.6 billion?
Is the annual rate of increase for the total capital expenditure 8.5 percent?
Was the analysis in 2016 conducted on 106 medicines?

src: It is speculated that the flu pandemic of 1890 may have been caused by this spillover event, and not by the influenza virus, because of the related timing, neurological symptoms, and unknown causative agent of the pandemic.
mt: Se especula que la pandemia de gripe de 1890 pudo haber sido causada por este evento de salto interespecífico y no por el virus de la influenza, debido a estos factores relacionados: el momento de aparición, los síntomas neurológicos y el agente causante desconocido de la pandemia.
pert_mt: Se especula que la pandemia de gripe de 1890 pudo haber sido causada por este evento de salto interespecífico y no por el virus de la influenza, debido a estos factores relacionados: el momento de aparición, los síntomas neurológicos, los casos de neumonía y el agente causante desconocido de la pandemia.
bt: It is speculated that the 1890 flu pandemic may have been caused by this interspecific jump event and not by the influenza virus, due to these related factors: the time of onset, neurological symptoms, cases of pneumonia and the unknown causative agent of the pandemic.
questions_bt: What is speculated about the 1890 flu pandemic?
What might have caused the 1890 flu pandemic according to the speculation?
What related factors are mentioned for the cause of the pandemic?
What is the unknown causative agent of the pandemic mentioned in the sentence?
answers_src: It is speculated that the flu pandemic of 1890 may have been caused by this spillover event, and not by the influenza virus
answers_bt: It is speculated that the 1890 flu pandemic may have been caused by this interspecific jump event and not by the influenza virus
This interspecific jump event and not by the influenza virus
the time of onset, neurological symptoms, cases of pneumonia
contrastive_questions: Is it speculated that the 1890 flu pandemic may have been caused by an interspecific jump event?
Did the answer state that the 1890 flu pandemic was caused by an interspecific jump event rather than the influenza virus?
Are the time of onset, neurological symptoms, and cases of pneumonia mentioned as related factors for the cause of the pandemic?
Is the unknown causative agent not specified in the sentence?

src: These persons should take steps to protect themselves from COVID-19, through washing their hands; cleaning and disinfecting high-touch surfaces; and social distancing, including staying at home, avoiding crowds, gatherings, and travel, and avoiding contact with persons who are ill.
mt: Estas personas deberían tomar medidas para protegerse de la COVID-19, como lavarse las manos, limpiar y desinfectar superficies de mucho contacto, y mantener el distanciamiento físico, lo que incluye quedarse en casa; evitar las multitudes, las reuniones y los viajes, y evitar el contacto con personas que estén enfermas.
pert_mt: Estas personas deberían tomar medidas para protegerse de la COVID-19, como lavarse las manos, limpiar y desinfectar superficies de mucho contacto, y mantener el distanciamiento físico, lo que incluye quedarse en casa; evitar las multitudes, las reuniones y los viajes, y evitar el contacto con personas que estén enfermas, así como usar mascarilla en lugares públicos.
bt: These people should take measures to protect themselves from COVID-19, such as washing their hands, cleaning and disinfecting areas with a lot of contact, and maintaining physical distance, which includes staying at home; avoiding crowds, gatherings and travel, and avoiding contact with people who are sick, as well as wearing a mask in public places.
questions_bt: What should these people do to protect themselves from COVID-19?

answers_src: Take steps to protect themselves from COVID-19, through washing their hands; cleaning and disinfecting high-touch surfaces; and social distancing
Avoiding contact with persons who are ill
answers_bt: Take measures to protect themselves from COVID-19, such as washing their hands, cleaning and disinfecting areas with a lot of contact, and maintaining physical distance, which includes staying at home; avoiding crowds, gatherings and travel, and avoiding contact with people who are sick
Avoiding contact with people who are sick
contrastive_questions: Do the measures include washing hands?
Do the measures include cleaning and disinfecting frequently contacted areas?

Does the answer include avoiding travel?

Should people wear a mask in public places?

src: If there are a small number of cases, this may assist in developing a test kit for patients to take to their own GP and explore its acceptability to patients.
mt: Si hay una pequeña cantidad de casos, esto puede ayudar a desarrollar un kit de prueba para que los pacientes lleven a su propio consultorio de medicina general y se explore su aceptabilidad para los pacientes.
pert_mt: Si hay una pequeña cantidad de casos, esto puede ayudar a desarrollar un kit de prueba para que los pacientes lleven a su propio consultorio de medicina general, se explore su aceptabilidad para los pacientes y se promueva la eficacia del tratamiento.
bt: If there are a small number of cases, this can help develop a test kit for patients to take to their own general practice, explore its acceptability to patients, and promote the effectiveness of treatment.

src: By targeting the reproduction number (R) (the average number of secondary cases each case generates) and aiming to reduce the R to below 1, the policy seeks to reduce case numbers to low levels or (as seen in previous outbreaks with severe acute respiratory syndrome and Ebola) to eliminate human-to-human transmission.
mt: Al centrarse en el número de reproducción (R) (la cantidad promedio de casos secundarios que genera cada caso) e intentar reducir R por debajo de 1, la política busca reducir la cantidad de casos a niveles bajos o (como se observó en brotes anteriores con el síndrome respiratorio agudo grave y el Ébola) eliminar la transmisión de persona a persona.
pert_mt: Al centrarse en el número de reproducción (R) (la cantidad promedio de casos secundarios que genera cada caso) e intentar reducir R por debajo de 1, la política busca reducir la cantidad de casos a niveles bajos o (como se observó en brotes anteriores con el síndrome respiratorio agudo grave y el Ébola) y controlar la transmisión de persona a persona.
bt: By focusing on the number of reproductions (R) (the average number of secondary cases generated by each case) and trying to reduce R to less than 1, the policy seeks to reduce the number of cases to low levels or (as seen in previous outbreaks with severe acute respiratory syndrome and Ebola) and control transmission from person to person.
questions_bt: What does the policy seek to reduce?
What is the target value for R?
What is R?
What are the examples of previous outbreaks mentioned?
answers_src: case numbers to low levels or eliminate human-to-human transmission
the average number of secondary cases each case generates
severe acute respiratory syndrome and Ebola
answers_bt: the number of cases to low levels or control transmission from person to person
the average number of secondary cases generated by each case
severe acute respiratory syndrome and Ebola
contrastive_questions: Does the policy seek to reduce the number of cases to low levels?
Does the policy aim to control transmission from person to person?
Is the target value for R less than 1?
Is R defined as the average number of secondary cases generated by each case?
Were severe acute respiratory syndrome and Ebola mentioned as examples of previous outbreaks?

src: Serious complications include pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and multi-organ failure leading to disability or death.

pert_mt: Las complicaciones graves incluyen neumonía, síndrome de dificultad respiratoria aguda, fallo multiorgánico y shock séptico que puede causar una discapacidad o la muerte.
bt: Serious complications include pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, multiorgan failure and septic shock that can cause disability or death.

answers_bt: pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, multiorgan failure and septic shock

src: This is so that, if someone on the flight turns out to be infected, the authorities can track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine.
mt: El objetivo de esto es que, si alguien en el vuelo está infectado, las autoridades puedan hacer un seguimiento con las personas que estaban sentadas cerca de este pasajero para someterlas a una prueba o ponerlas en cuarentena.
pert_mt: El objetivo de esto es que, si alguien en el vuelo está infectado, las autoridades puedan hacer un seguimiento con las personas que estaban sentadas cerca de este pasajero y también con el resto de pasajeros para someterlas a una prueba o ponerlas en cuarentena.
bt: The purpose of this is that, if someone on the flight is infected, the authorities can follow up with the people who were sitting near this passenger and also with the rest of the passengers to test them or quarantine them.
questions_bt: What is the purpose of following up with people who were sitting near a potentially infected passenger?

answers_src: to track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine
track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine
answers_bt: to test them or quarantine them
follow up with the people who were sitting near this passenger
contrastive_questions: Is the purpose of following up to test or quarantine them?

src: In the wake of Cornell's decision to keep students home following spring break and transition to virtual instruction, the Mayor of Ithaca called for "immediate and forceful federal action — we will see a horrific economic impact as a result of Cornell University closing."
mt: Tras la decisión de Cornell de que los estudiantes se queden en casa después del receso de primavera y de adoptar la enseñanza virtual, el alcalde de Ithaca exigió "una acción federal inmediata y contundente: veremos un impacto económico atroz como consecuencia del cierre de Cornell University".
pert_mt: Tras la decisión de Cornell de que los estudiantes se queden en casa después del receso de primavera y de adoptar la enseñanza virtual, el alcalde de Ithaca exigió "una acción federal inmediata y contundente: veremos un impacto económico atroz e inesperado como consecuencia del cierre de Cornell University".
bt: Following Cornell's decision that students stay home after the spring break and adopt virtual teaching, the mayor of Ithaca demanded "immediate and forceful federal action: we will see a dire and unexpected economic impact as a result of the closure of Cornell University".
questions_bt: What did Cornell decide regarding students after the spring break?
What teaching method did Cornell adopt following their decision?
What action did the mayor of Ithaca demand?
What impact did the mayor predict as a result of Cornell University's closure?
answers_src: ["keep students home", "virtual instruction", ""immediate and forceful federal action"", "a horrific economic impact"]
answers_bt: ["students stay home", "virtual teaching", ""immediate and forceful federal action"", "a dire and unexpected economic impact"]
contrastive_questions: Did Cornell decide that students should stay home?
Was virtual teaching decided upon by Cornell?
Did Cornell call for immediate and forceful federal action?

src: This process may include checking pseudonymized NHS numbers for positive individuals at RCGP RSC practices, checking current PHE guidance regarding considerations of infectiousness for confirmed cases, and offering the patient an appointment following the previously mentioned process.

pert_mt: Este proceso puede incluir verificar los números seudonimizados del NHS de personas que obtuvieron resultados positivos en los consultorios del RSC del RCGP, verificar la directriz actual de PHE sobre las consideraciones de infecciosidad para los casos confirmados, ofrecerle al paciente una cita siguiendo el proceso anteriormente mencionado y enviarle un recordatorio por mensaje de texto.
bt: This process may include checking the pseudonymised NHS numbers of people who tested positive in RCGP's RSC offices, checking the current PHE guideline on infectious considerations for confirmed cases, offering the patient an appointment following the aforementioned process and sending him a reminder via text message.

src: 1) To preserve the public health and safety, and to ensure the healthcare delivery system is capable of serving all, and prioritizing those at the highest risk and vulnerability, all residents are directed to immediately heed the current State public health directives, which I ordered the Department of Public Health to develop for the current statewide status of COVID-19.
mt: 1) A los fines de proteger la salud y la seguridad públicas y garantizar que el sistema de atención sanitaria pueda servir a todos y, priorizando a aquellos que se encuentran en una mayor situación de riesgo y vulnerabilidad, se ordena a todos los residentes que acaten de inmediato las directivas de salud pública actuales del estado, las cuales desarrolló, bajo mis órdenes, el Departamento de Salud Pública para la situación actual a nivel estatal de la COVID-19.
pert_mt: A los fines de proteger la salud y la seguridad públicas y garantizar que el sistema de atención sanitaria pueda servir a todos, y priorizando a aquellos que se encuentran en una mayor situación de riesgo y vulnerabilidad, se ordena a todos los residentes que acaten de inmediato las directivas de salud pública actuales del estado, las cuales desarrolló, bajo mis órdenes, el Departamento de Salud Pública para la situación actual a nivel estatal de la COVID-19.
bt: In order to protect public health and safety and ensure that the health care system can serve everyone, and prioritizing those who are at greater risk and vulnerability, all residents are ordered to immediately comply with the current state public health directives, which were developed, under my orders, by the Department of Public Health for the current statewide COVID-19 situation.
questions_bt: What are all residents ordered to do?
What system needs to serve everyone according to the order?
Who developed the current state public health directives?
What were the directives developed for according to the sentence?
answers_src: immediately heed the current State public health directives
the current statewide status of COVID-19
answers_bt: immediately comply with the current state public health directives
contrastive_questions: Are residents required to comply with current state public health directives?
Does the answer state that the health care system needs to serve everyone according to the order?
Did the Department of Public Health develop the current state public health directives?
Were the directives developed for the current statewide COVID-19 situation?

src: Probable case : "A suspect case for whom testing for the COVID-19 virus is inconclusive" OR "a suspect case for whom testing could not be performed for any reason".
mt: Caso probable: "Un caso sospechoso cuya prueba del virus que causa la COVID-19 no es conclusiva" O "un caso sospecho al cual no se le pudo realizar la prueba por cualquier motivo".
pert_mt: Caso probable: "Un caso sospechoso cuya prueba del virus que causa la COVID-19 no es concluyente" O "un caso sospechoso al cual no se le pudo realizar la prueba por cualquier motivo".
bt: Possible case: "A suspected case whose test for the virus that causes COVID-19 is not conclusive" or "a suspected case for which testing could not be carried out for any reason".
questions_bt: What defines a possible case?
What is the status of the test for the virus that causes COVID-19 in a possible case?

answers_src: ["A suspect case for whom testing for the COVID-19 virus is inconclusive or "a suspect case for whom testing could not be performed for any reason"", "inconclusive", "testing could not be performed for any reason"]
answers_bt: [""A suspected case whose test for the virus that causes COVID-19 is not conclusive" or "a suspected case for which testing could not be carried out for any reason"", "not conclusive", "testing could not be carried out for any reason"]
contrastive_questions: Is a possible case defined as one where the virus test is not conclusive?

the last third of the virus genome

src: COVID-19 surveillance is expected to monitor epidemiological trends, rapidly detect new cases, and based on this information, provide epidemiological information to conduct risk assessment and guide disease preparedness.
mt: Se espera que la vigilancia de la COVID-19 monitoree las tendencias epidemiológicas, detecte rápidamente los casos nuevos y, con base en esta información, brinde información epidemiológica para evaluar el riesgo y guiar la preparación contra la enfermedad.
pert_mt: Se espera que la vigilancia de la COVID-19 monitoree las tendencias epidemiológicas, detecte rápidamente los casos nuevos y, con base en esta información precisa, brinde datos epidemiológicos para evaluar el riesgo y guiar la preparación contra la enfermedad.
bt: COVID-19 surveillance is expected to monitor epidemiological trends, quickly detect new cases and, based on this accurate information, provide epidemiological data to assess risk and guide preparedness against the disease.
questions_bt: What is expected to monitor epidemiological trends?
What will quickly detect new cases?
What will provide epidemiological data to assess risk and guide preparedness against the disease?
answers_bt: provide epidemiological data to assess risk and guide preparedness against the disease
contrastive_questions: Is COVID-19 surveillance expected to monitor epidemiological trends?
Is it stated that something will quickly detect new cases?
Will providing epidemiological data help assess risk and guide preparedness against the disease?

src: The NHS uses the Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT) system of coding, which is normally only updated twice annually.

pert_mt: El NHS utiliza el sistema de codificación de la Nomenclatura Sistematizada de Medicina - Términos Clínicos (SNOMED CT), que generalmente solo se actualiza dos veces al año, de manera rigurosa.
bt: The NHS uses the codification system of the Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine - Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT), which is usually only updated twice a year, rigorously.
questions_bt: Which system does the NHS use for codification?

answers_bt: Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine - Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT)
contrastive_questions: Does the NHS use Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine - Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT) for codification?

src: They also looked at the dynamics of the spread of influenza in France during French school holidays and noted that cases of flu dropped when schools closed and re-emerged when they re-opened.
mt: También analizaron la dinámica de la propagación de la gripe en Francia durante las vacaciones escolares francesas y observaron que los casos de gripe disminuían cuando las escuelas estaban cerradas y reaparecían cuando volvían a abrir.
pert_mt: También analizaron la dinámica de la propagación de la gripe en Francia durante las vacaciones escolares francesas y observaron que los casos de gripe disminuían gradualmente cuando las escuelas estaban cerradas y reaparecían cuando volvían a abrir.

src: Community mitigation strategies, which aim to slow the spread of COVID-19, are important to protect all persons from COVID-19, especially persons with underlying health conditions and other persons at risk for severe COVID-19–associated disease (https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/downloads/community-mitigation-strategy.pdf).
mt: Las estrategias de mitigación comunitaria, cuyo objetivo es frenar la propagación de la COVID-19, son importantes para proteger a todas las personas de la COVID-19, en especial a las personas con afecciones médicas subyacentes y otras personas en riesgo de enfermedad grave asociada a la COVID-19 (https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/downloads/community-mitigation-strategy.pdf).
pert_mt: Las estrategias de mitigación comunitaria, cuyo objetivo es frenar la propagación de la COVID-19, son importantes para proteger a todas las personas de la COVID-19, en especial a las personas con afecciones médicas subyacentes, a los trabajadores esenciales y otras personas en riesgo de enfermedad grave asociada a la COVID-19 (https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/downloads/community-mitigation-strategy.pdf).
bt: Community mitigation strategies, which aim to curb the spread of COVID-19, are important to protect all people from COVID-19, especially those with underlying medical conditions, essential workers and others at risk of serious illness associated with COVID-19 (https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/downloads/community-mitigation-strategy.pdf).
